		                    Stage IV Laryngeal Cancer
		                    Treatment of stage IV laryngeal cancer depends on where cancer is found in the larynx.   If cancer is in the supraglottis or glottis, treatment may include the following:         -  Chemotherapy and radiation therapy given together.    - Chemotherapy followed by chemotherapy and radiation therapy given together.
